name: F*&kTrump
description:
Do your civic duty. Flip off our orange haired ass of a president (with your right hand) to shoot a projectile and watch him explode. Trump comes charging at you from all angles, 360 degrees, so stay alert.

This game is a Work-In-Progress. We’d appreciate any feedback on how we can improve the experience of flipping Trump off.

Although it’s a free download, 90% of donations will go towards communities that Trump has personally disenfranchised. From now until the end of October, we will be supporting voter rights orgs: 

  • Ignite: a non profit that registers and mobilizes millions of Gen Z voters across America. Gen Z is the fastest-growing portion of the electorate. If they vote at full potential, they will represent 13% of voters in 2020 and could potentially determine the outcome of that election.
  • Black Led Organizing Fund: a fund that supports 41 black-led groups organizing in communities across the country, including Black Phoenix Votes, which builds black political power through political education, leadership development, policy advocacy, and electoral engagement, and Florida Rights Restoration Coalition, which fights to return voting and civil rights to those caught in the criminal justice system and impacted by a Jim Crow-era lifetime voting ban.

10% will be dedicated to ongoing development costs. 

Join us on Discord to get updates, see monthly donation receipts, ask for features you want to see, and talk to other players about ways to un-fuck ourselves out of the mess he created - like making a voting plan. At the end of every month, we will vote on where to send donations.

Discord: https://discord.gg/pHzcGKV
